io.github.borisnaguet.solr.maven

Class SolrCloudManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.borisnaguet.solr.maven.SolrCloudManager

  • public class SolrCloudManager
extends Object
    Wrapper around SolrCloudManager to manage operation on the cloud, the maven way (with Log , and returning MojoExecutionException...)

    Most methods takes a Log as parameter, as strange as it seems, because we must get it from AbstractMojo.getLog() and it must not be cached on construction (this manager being set in MavenSession and reused from different Mojos).

    Author:
    BorisNaguet
